original: intros n i f H. intros H0. assert (f i <= f i) as H1 by auto. assert (f n <= f n) as H2 by auto. apply (sum_0n_le_one (S n) f i) in H0. apply (sum_0n_le_one (S n) f n) in H1. apply (sum_0n_le_one (S n) f n) in H2. rewrite <- Nat.add_succ_l. rewrite <- Newton_nat. rewrite (Nat.le_0_l i). rewrite (Nat.le_0_l (S n)). rewrite (Nat.add_0_r (f 0)). rewrite (m( f 0) (f n)). rewrite (m(f n) (f 0)). rewrite (msum_ext (fun j => f (S n + j)) (fun j => f (S n + j))). rewrite (msum_msum _ _ _ (fun _ => S n)). apply f_equal.
